thread.section_title: Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic.- sad to leave.
thread.title_full: Fantastic.- sad to leave. - Review of Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Janice L
title: Fantastic.- sad to leave.
text:
We had a 3 night stay which we thoroughly enjoyed. Our room was lovely, and the bed comfy. We were disappointed to only have 1 chair which meant that someone had to sit on the bed but this is didn't matter too much.
The bathroom was very luxurious. It had a Jacuzzi bath which we don't have at home so it was a great treat.
Breakfast was exceptional; it was delicious and the variety of food on offer was the best we've had at any hotel we've stayed at. The home made cakes and yoghurt are not to be missed!
All the staff were very kind and very helpful.
The ,location is great, very close to friendly restaurants selling lovely food. It is very close to the Spanish steps which has a lovely atmosphere both during the day and at night.
We will remember our stay at the Manfredi with fondness and can't wait to go back.
Room Tip: Not much of a view from our room but we didn't mind that. See more room tips
